NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Access workshop schedules, artist biographies, create your personal schedule and more. Swipe for a tutorial or Skip.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the mobile app
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Check out all the workshops, filter workshops by day (e.g. Friday, Saturday, Sunday) or dance type (e.g. Salsa), and read biographies of each artist or search for your favorite artist in the Artists tab.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: From workshop screen, add to your favorites/schedule. Check out information about the hotel, public transportation, theme parties, DJs and more
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
